note,
`status`,
notifyer_phone,
create_time,
update_time,

note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
notifyer_phone = #{notifyerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:

from monitor_server where ip_address=#{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = 1
